name: Islands of Asrora
description:
I created this game for Adventure Jam 2022 over the course of 2 weeks. 

It is a pretty short platforming adventure game created in Unity with the help of some asset packs credited below.

You can find out more about me on Twitter at @Enerbunnii

Credits:
  • Kenny's Assets (Nature Kit, Castle Kit, Fantasy Town Kit, Survival Kit)
  • Battle Wizard Low Poly Art 
  • Nox_Sound (Footsteps and Nature Essentials)
  • Minimalist Free - Lowpoly Flat/Gradient Shader
  • Polygonal's Low-Poly Particle Pack
  • LowPoly Water
  • Modular First Person Controller
Known Issues:
  • When first taking control of an object the camera may freak out. Moving the camera manually with IJKL or simply moving or rotating the object usually fixes this.
